notes: Can only trigger when an attack lands on an enemy. This means it cannot trigger on missed attacks.
Only triggers against enemy heroes (including illusions and clones, excluding creep-heroes).
Does not trigger if the attacking unit is a clone or illusion.
abilities.description: The next attack silences the hit enemy for 1.75 seconds.

additionalInformation: The attack damage bonus is magical. It neither works with lifesteal, nor with crit or cleave.
name: Mind Breaker
description: A bewitching blade of indeterminate form capable of piercing the psyche of even the most willful foe.
